lvardefs.name: redefinePropsRead
lvardefs.desc: list of properties that are used when redefining a style from selection (used when reading properties)

lvardefs.name: redefinePropsWrite
lvardefs.desc: list of properties that are used when redefining a style from selection (used when writing properties)

lvardefs.name: redefineValues
lvardefs.desc: variable for storing list of values during redefining a style
